data.comment: The match is underway at De Oude Meerdijk.
Emmen take a 1-0 lead thanks to Michael de Leeuw.
In the minute 13, Goal! Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Vangelis Pavlidis to set up the goal.
Glenn Bijl (Emmen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 26, The away team has substituted Che Nunnely with John Yeboah. Adrie Koster is thus making his first change.
Edwin Van de Graaf blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 53, Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a second substitution, with Mats Kohlert replacing Miquel Nelom.
Glenn Bijl (Emmen) has been shown a straight red card by referee Edwin Van de Graaf.
Emmen make their first substitution with Desevio Payne replacing Marko Kolar.
In the minute 76, Robbert de Vos is on a sub for Michael de Leeuw for Emmen.
Edwin Van de Graaf blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
The home team replace Nikolai Laursen with Anco Jansen.
Sebastian Holmen (Willem II) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
